amendment.description: To require an expedited decision with respect to securing land-based missile fields.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4247 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4247 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Daines. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3490) To require an expedited decision with respect to securing land-based missile fields.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4247 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4247 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Daines.
